Estamos buscando Inspetores de Qualidade de Construção Industrial (disciplina: Instrumentação/Automação) para atuar em um de nossos projetos da Indústria Farmacêutica.


Requisitos:

 

·         Experiência comprovada como Inspetor de Qualidade de Construção Industrial na disciplina de Instrumentação/Automação. Mínimo 8 anos de experiencia em obras de grande porte.

·         Conhecimento profundo de normas e procedimentos de qualidade aplicáveis na Construção Industrial.

·         Conhecimento de normas e procedimentos de Segurança, tendo a Segurança como um valor inegociável.

·         Habilidade para ler e interpretar desenhos técnicos, normas. procedimentos e especificações.

·         Atenção aos detalhes e habilidades analíticas.

·         Boa comunicação verbal e escrita.

·         Certificações relevantes na área técnica e de inspeção de qualidade.


Responsabilidades:

 

•       Fiscalizar as empresas contratadas para a construção da Planta Industrial, fazendo a gestão da qualidade e garantindo a execução eficiente e segura do projeto;

•       Implementar, capacitar, monitorar e controlar o plano de execução da qualidade do projeto e o das contratadas;

•       Identificar e resolver problemas antecipadamente para evitar impactos no cronograma da obra;

•       Monitorar a qualidade do projeto e identificar, registrar e apoiar a solução das eventuais não conformidades das contratadas;

•       Apoiar tecnicamente o gerenciamento contratadas, garantindo o cumprimento de todas as obrigações e procedimentos de qualidade;

•       Comunicar-se efetivamente com todos os envolvidos na construção;

•       Assegurar a conformidade com todas as normas e regulamentações de qualidade, segurança e meio ambiente;

•       Buscar oportunidades de melhoria contínua na eficiência e na qualidade da construção;

•       Representar a empresa em reuniões e eventos relacionados ao projeto.


Local de Trabalho: Montes Claros – MG (100% presencial)

results.title: Financial Analyst
results.location: Latin America-Brazil-São Paulo-São José dos Campos
results.description:
Financial Analyst-2407025148W

Description

 

Financial Analyst, SC Procurement

Who We Are

At Kenvue, we realize the extraordinary power of everyday care. Built on over a century of heritage and rooted in science, we’re the house of iconic brands - including NEUTROGENA®, AVEENO®, TYLENOL®, LISTERINE®, JOHNSON’S® and BAND-AID® that you already know and love. Science is our passion; care is our talent. Our global team is made by 22,000 diverse and brilliant people, passionate about insights, innovation and committed to deliver the best products to our customers. With expertise and empathy, being a Kenvuer means to have the power to impact life of millions of people every day. We put people first, care fiercely, earn trust with science and solve with courage – and have brilliant opportunities waiting for you! Join us in shaping our future–and yours. For more information, click here.

The position relies on building meaningful business partnership with stakeholders as well as engaging and driving collaboration with other finance teams in the region supporting other Supply Chain pillars and Franchise.

The Financial Analyst - will provide strong financial support and guidance to the Global Procurement organization in strong alignment and collaboration with the regional finance teams. This position requires both a strong financial background with a detailed approach to analytics as well as an ability to operate within a big picture perspective to support global categories.

The candidate will actively drive transparency, understanding and visibility of key financial metrics to business partners including but not limited to Purchase Price Variance (PPV), Cost Improvement Projects, Commodity Inflation/Deflation and Strategic Investments.  They will support the procurement team through monthly, quarterly financial updates and annual Business Planning; building and delivering on comprehensive analytics, crisp story telling and understanding of business drivers for the categories focused on maximizing value creation.  The candidate will also participate in data analytics and enable robust Year over Year cost change improvement and analytics.

A process driven and proactive mindset will be critical to the success of this role to build and deliver successful results for Kenvue.

 

Main Responsibilities

  • Financial Business Partner: Collaborate with procurement to assess and drive cost improvement initiatives and support purchase price variance (PPV) analytics, story telling, decision making. Identify financial impacts of risk and opportunities across sourcing categories.
  • Financial Analytics: Conduct financial and procurement analysis related to commodity inflation, cost improvements business cases and category strategies to drive decision-making.
  • Budgeting and Forecasting: Contribute to business planning, quarterly updates, and yearly financial activities like cost setting, scenario planning by delivering valuable insights to key stakeholders.
  • Compliance and Controls: Ensure adherence to SOX, WWP, and internal policies. Assist in improving financial controls and enhancing the procurement process.
  • Process Improvement: Support efforts to automate, simplify processes, add value and increase transparency within procurement finance.
  • Reporting: Prepare and deliver crisps reports, presentations and financial insights for both mid-level and senior stakeholders, focusing on supplier costs and savings.

Qualifications

 

Required Qualifications

  • Education: A minimum of a bachelor’s degree in business, finance, accounting, engineering, or related fields.
  • Experience: 3-5 years of relevant experience in financial analysis, procurement finance, or related fields.
  • Skills:
    • Strong analytical abilities, including the ability to interpret and model financial data.
    • Proficiency in financial systems such as SAP,
    • Advanced Microsoft Office (Excel) and BI tools.
    • The ability to communicate complex financial concepts clearly.
    • Solid understanding of procurement processes and spend analysis.
  • Language: Fluent English.

Desired Qualifications

  • Previous experience working with global sourcing teams or finance business partnering.
  • Experience with compliance or audit-related activities.
  • Supply Chain or Procurement background is preferred.
  • Financial modeling and forecasting expertise.

 

Primary Location

 Latin America-Brazil-São Paulo-São José dos Campos

Job Function

 Finance

results.description:
Digestive Brand Manager – Self Care-2407024971W

Description

 

Kenvue is currently recruiting for:

               

Digestive Health Brand Manager – Self Care

This position reports into Marketing Director and is based at Sao Paulo.

 

Who we are

At Kenvue, we realize the extraordinary power of everyday care. Built on over a century of heritage and rooted in science, we’re the house of iconic brands - including NEUTROGENA®, AVEENO®, TYLENOL®, LISTERINE®, JOHNSON’S® and BAND-AID® that you already know and love. Science is our passion; care is our talent. Our global team is made by 22,000 diverse and brilliant people, passionate about insights, innovation and committed to deliver the best products to our customers. With expertise and empathy, being a Kenvuer means to have the power to impact life of millions of people every day. We put people first, care fiercely, earn trust with science and solve with courage – and have brilliant opportunities waiting for you! Join us in shaping our future–and yours.

               

What you will do

The Digestive Health Brand Manager is responsible for developing new concepts and approaches for professional and consumer advertising and promotional plans, performing sales and competitive analysis, monitoring implementation of brand strategy, overseeing market research and test market activities, and establishing partnerships with medical societies, opinion leaders, consumers, patients, clients and other enterprises. As the Specialist, you will be considered an expert in the field within the organization and will be responsible for building inroads with key customer relationships and partnerships for market development and enhanced competitive market share:

Key Responsibilities

·       Develop and execute innovative marketing strategies to promote digestive health products

·       Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure brand consistency and maximize brand exposure

·       Analyze market trends and consumer insights to identify opportunities for growth and differentiation

·       Manage budgets and timelines for marketing campaigns and initiatives

·       Lead the development of creative content for various marketing channels, including social media, email, and website

·       Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing efforts, making recommendations for improvement as needed

·       Develop and execute innovative professional and consumer advertising and promotional plans in alignment with brand strategy

·       Perform advanced sales and competitive analysis to identify market trends and opportunities

·       Monitor and adjust brand strategy as needed to ensure consistency with overall product strategy

·       Guide advertising agencies in product and packaging design, advertising, tradeshows, point of purchase, costing and pricing

·       Analyze key performance indicators and financial reports to suggest improvements

·       Oversee extensive market research and test market activities to inform product criteria and characteristics

·       Establish partnerships with medical societies, opinion leaders, consumers, patients, clients and other enterprises

·       Develop strategy for uncovering market opportunities and prioritize intelligence information

·       Evaluate and implement improvements for expediting new and existing products and programs

·       Build and maintain key customer relationships and partnerships for market development and enhanced competitive market share

·       Forecast demand and participate in review of sales forecasts for assigned product line

Qualifications

 

What we are looking for

Required Qualifications

·        Experience in marketing or business, preferably in the healthcare industry

·       Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field

·       Proven ability to perform advanced sales and competitive analysis

·       Experience overseeing market research and test market activities

·       Strong analytical skills with ability to analyze key performance indicators and financial reports

·       Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams

·       Ability to prioritize intelligence information and uncover market opportunities

·       Experience evaluating and implementing improvements for expediting new and existing products and programs

·       Proven ability to build and maintain key customer relationships and partnerships for market development and enhanced competitive market share

 

Desired Qualifications

·       Creative thinker with a passion for developing innovative marketing solutions

·       Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for establishing partnerships with medical societies, opinion leaders, consumers, patients, clients and other enterprises

 

What’s in it for you

·       Competitive Benefit Package*       

·       Paid Company Holidays, Paid Vacation, Volunteer Time, Summer Fridays & More!       

·       Learning & Development Opportunities        

·       Employee Resource Groups         

·       This list could vary based on location/region

       

*Note: Total Rewards at Kenvue include salary, bonus (if applicable) and benefits. Your Talent Access Partner will be able to share more about our total rewards offerings and the specific salary range for the relevant location(s) during the recruitment & hiring process.

       

Kenvue is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, national origin, or protected veteran status and will not be discriminated against on the basis of disability.

Responsibilities

TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.

To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.

results.title: Time-sensitive Content Operation - Trust and Safety - São Paulo
results.description:
Responsibilities

About TikTok
ByteDance is a global incubator of platforms at the cutting edge of commerce, content, entertainment, and enterprise services - over 2.5 billion people interact with ByteDance products, including TikTok

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.
Join us.

About
Building a world where people can safely discover, create and connect. The Trust & Safety (T&S) team at TikTok helps ensure that our global online community is safe and empowered to create and enjoy content across all of our applications. We have invested heavily in human and machine-based moderation to remove harmful content quickly and often before it reaches our general community.

Our team performs a critical function that supports our efforts to address objectionable or disturbing content. Content that the Product Policy Specialist interacts with includes images, video, and text related to every-day life, but it can also include (but is not limited to) bullying; hate speech; child safety; depictions of harm to self and others, and harm to animals.
About the team.

Responsibilities
- Responsible for improving Core Product Operations metrics in regional markets, including but not limited to search growth, content expansion and user experience;
- Expand regional candidate pool with time-sensitive queries and core verticals in the target market, responsible for putting hot / fresh queries, including but not limited to news/events/verticals that meet product demand;
- Monitor regional search data, evaluate quality and effectiveness of online recommendation, understand search needs and preferences based on metric infructuation, provide localized analysis and suggestions for the product ops team to optimize strategies;
- Manage regional user feedback for search recommendations, take actions and record cases for periodical analysis to improve user experience accordingly;
- Work closely and flexibly with data delivery teams and Cross-Functional stakeholders to achieve regional targets together;
- Please note that this position involves exposure to sensitive content, including but not limited to harmful content, violence, pornography, and fake news.

Qualifications

Minimum Qualifications:
- Relevant experience in the tech industry, including but not limited to content, operation, news, search or related areas;
- Excellent language skills, profound understanding of market culture/user/media content;
- Proficient in English and Portuguese;
- Good at data analysis and communication skills and project management experience is preferred;
- Familiar with search engines and social media platforms, including but not limited to TikTok, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube, etc;
- Team player, goal-oriented, ready to embrace change and challenges, able to work in a global team efficiently;
- Willing to work on shifts, which includes weekends and public holidays.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Bachelor degree or above, preferably in Journalism or data/content/culture-related majors;
- Experience in working with multiple stakeholders and collaborating across business units;

Trust & Safety recognises that keeping our platform safe for TikTok communities is no ordinary job which can be both rewarding and psychologically demanding and emotionally taxing for some. This is why we are sharing the potential hazards, risks and implications in this unique line of work from the start, so our candidates are well informed before joining.We are committed to the wellbeing of all our employees and promise to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.

About the team
We are looking for a customer service, detail-oriented Lead Client Solutions Manager to join our Client Solutions Team in many business verticals. The Lead Client Solutions Manager is a crucial member of our growing Global Business Solutions team that supports our sales team in meeting its objectives and providing best in class customer service to clients, both internally and externally. The Lead Client Solutions Manager role is responsible for partnering with the sales team to drive revenue by negotiating and optimizing complex opportunities and using data and analytics to build a consultative solution for our customers. The Lead Solutions Manager team will establish and strengthen key client relationships with a focus on driving revenue, advertiser education & advertiser satisfaction. Success in this position requires a focus on client service, the ability to thrive in a dynamic work environment, and the ability to provide custom solutions for advertisers leveraging our unique ad product suite.

- Drive education on product, company updates and share company best practices as relevant to client or agencies' business;
- Manage and grow post-sale client relationships of auction ads offerings by monitor and analyze ad campaigns, and proactively take initiative to improve results;

- Share marketplace feedback and guide our advertising strategy;
- Support and work with the sales team on pre-sale research and pitch;
- Conduct regular business reviews and take a consultative, long-term approach to build productive relationships with clients, in collaboration with the sales team;
- Investigate and work directly with product & engineering teams to help them troubleshoot client issues during a campaign;
- Establish long-term relationship with key clients and make sure their business needs are taken good care of by cross-functional team.
- Manage the team of managers, helping them improve and thrive.

Product and go-to-market strategy
1.Responsible for improvement of product feature adoption and consistently drive the product improvement from market feedback;
2.Share marketplace feedback and guide our advertising strategy.

Qualifications

- At least 5 years of experience in account management/client services roles in digital marketing;
- Experience in managing key accounts in diverse industries;
- Experience managing performance advertisers with a deep understanding of their challenges;

- Proactive attitude with excellent data analytical skills.

results.description:

About the team
The Search and Account Safety Operations team will assume a critical role in ensuring the seamless operation of TikTok's search and account domains, implementing operational processes, and overseeing day-to-day activities. By proactively addressing safety concerns and enhancing operational efficiency, the team will significantly contribute to TikTok's mission of providing a safe, smooth, and enjoyable search experience for users worldwide.

Our frontline teams interact with images, video, text related to every-day life, but it can also include (but is not limited to) bullying; hate speech; child safety; depictions of harm to self and others, and harm to animals.

Responsibilities

Oversee a team of Evaluators and Analysts responsible for monitoring and analyzing Search & Account related projects.
Develop training programs for Evaluators to ensure that they have the necessary skills and knowledge to perform their duties effectively.
Establish processes for identifying and handling escalated issues that may require additional review or action.
Conduct regular performance evaluations for team members and provide ongoing feedback and coaching to boost performance levels.
Work with cross-functional teams to identify needs, concerns and areas for improvement, and contribute to the optimization of evaluation and quality performance.
Provide weekly and monthly reports on evaluation conclusions to stakeholder teams.
Collaborate with other teams on special projects and initiatives as necessary.

Qualifications

Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor's degree or above.
Excellent oral and written communication skills in English.
Proficiency in using moderation tools and content management systems. Strong leadership skills, with the ability to engage and motivate a team to deliver high-quality results.

Preferred Qualifications
Excellent content analysis and communication skills. Data analysis skills will be preferred.
In-depth understanding of TikTok content policies and community guidelines. Proven work experience in content moderation, content analysis, or a related field.
---
Trust & Safety recognises that keeping our platform safe for TikTok communities is no ordinary job which can be both rewarding and psychologically demanding and emotionally taxing for some. This is why we are sharing the potential hazards, risks and implications in this unique line of work from the start, so our candidates are well informed before joining.We are committed to the wellbeing of all our employees and promise to provide comprehensive and evidence-based programs, to promote and support physical and mental wellbeing throughout each employee's journey with us. We believe that wellbeing is a relationship and that everyone has a part to play, so we work in collaboration and consultation with our employees and across our functions in order to ensure a truly person-centred, innovative and integrated approach.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. results.title: Red Bull Student Marketeer - Criciúma - UNESC
results.description:
Descrição da empresa

Nossos Student Marketeers fazem parte do programa de embaixadores de marca mais dinâmico e capacitado do mundo. Eles entendem o público-alvo da Red Bull e são responsáveis por impulsionar a imagem da marca e a funcionalidade do produto em seu Campus e em sua região. O objetivo do programa Student Markteeer é alcançar novos consumidores, entusiasmar os estudantes universitários, aumentar as vendas e gerenciar a marca Red Bull em seu Campus. Isso inclui o contato direto com consumidores e clientes, convidando a experimentação de produtos, além de trabalhar em eventos da Red Bull para garantir uma experiência de marca inesquecível para os consumidores. Os Student Marketeers valorizam a flexibilidade em um trabalho e adoram trabalhar em um ambiente criativo.

Descrição da vaga

SEJA UM EMBAIXADOR DA MARCA E PRODUTO

Viva e respire a personalidade da marca e os valores da empresa, representando a marca de forma excepcional através de interações diárias com os consumidores e/ou clientes.
Aumente a base de consumideres convidando pessoas a experimentarem Red Bull, nos lugares certos e no momento certo, respondendo assertivamente a quaisquer perguntas dos consumidores.
Crie e execute um plano personalizado e inovador no campus, envolvendo estudantes e dando vida à marca na universidade.
Estabeleça uma sólida rede de contatos, através de relacionamentos com responsáveis chave.
Impulsione o envolvimento da marca em suas próprias redes sociais através de conteúdo autêntico.
Trabalhe em eventos da Red Bull e eventos apoiados, para garantir uma experiência de marca inesquecível para os consumidores.

SEJA UM ESPECIALISTA EM VENDAS

Construa relacionamentos com clientes locais de pontos de venda e garanta que a Red Bull esteja disponível e visível aos consumidores.
Colabore com as vendas para abrir novos pontos de distribuição para a Red Bull em seu campus e além.
Aproveite os recursos relevantes do mundo Red Bull para manter a marca sempre presente nos clientes locais.
Assegure a execução nos padrões de "loja perfeita".

EXCELÊNCIA NA EXECUÇÃO

Demonstre excelência na execução e atenção aos detalhes em todas suas áreas atuantes.
Compartilhe ideias e colabore com a equipe por meio de interações regulares presenciais e online.
Planeje e relate suas atividades através da plataforma online dedicada de forma pontual e precisa.
Contribua para desenvolver as plataformas de mídia da Red Bull fornecendo informações locais, tendências e oportunidades gerais.

Qualificações

Apaixonado(a) pela marca e produto da Red Bull.
Excelentes habilidades de comunicação.
Personalidade carismática, enérgica, positiva e extrovertida.
Imerso(a) na vida estudantil, com amplo entendimento do cenário universitário, cidade e região, incluindo atividades extra curriculares e pontos de interesse.
Muito acessível e sociável, com capacidade de se relacionar com diferentes pessoas em diversas ocasiões.
Possui uma mentalidade criativa e espírito empreendedor, com alto senso de responsabilidade e iniciativa.
Capacidade de conciliar trabalho de meio período e estudos.
Afinidade e desejo de aprender e aplicar uma nova gama de habilidades, especialmente em marketing e vendas.
Conectado(a) com diversos grupos e indivíduos influentes no campus.
Carteira de motorista válida.

Informações adicionais

Acreditamos no potencial de todas as pessoas para dar aaasas a ideias independente de expressão de gênero, raça, religião, orientação afetivo-sexual, origem, idade e deficiência. No mundo da Red Bull todas as pessoas são bem-vindas.

Somos uma empresa que valoriza o trabalho em equipe, pois através da colaboração podemos aprender e conquistar os melhores resultados. Acolhemos e valorizamos ideias para transformar positivamente nossas realidades.

Nosso compromisso com a Diversidade & Inclusão:
Diversidade & Inclusão para a Accor significa acolher cada um e respeitar suas diferenças, priorizando apenas qualidades e habilidades na ampliação de oportunidades de emprego e desenvolvimento.
Nossa ambição é proporcionar emprego com propósito, e uma cultura acolhedora, excelentes condições de trabalho e promover o desenvolvimento de todas as pessoas, incluindo as pessoas com deficiência.
Não hesite em nos informar de quaisquer necessidades específicas que possa ter para que possamos levá-las em consideração.

Por que trabalhar para a Accor?
Somos muito mais do que um líder mundial. Sejam bem-vindos como você é e você poderá encontrar um trabalho e uma marca que correspondam à sua personalidade.
Apoiamos você a crescer e aprender todos os dias, garantindo que o trabalho traga um propósito à sua vida, para que, durante sua jornada conosco, você possa continuar a explorar as possibilidades ilimitadas da Accor.
Ao ingressar na Accor, cada capítulo de sua história é sua para escrever e juntos podemos imaginar a hospitalidade de amanhã.

Faça o que você ama, cuide do mundo, ouse desafiar o status quo! #BELIMITLESS

Garantir a disponibilidade de apartamentos limpos e arrumados, bem como a organização e limpeza das áreas públicas, de acordo com o estilo da marca de atuação. Colocar o cliente no “coração” de tudo o que for realizado, a fim de oferecer a ele uma experiência única e inesquecível, em conformidade com a Cultura de Serviços Accor.

Ensino médio completo, Conhecimentos das rotinas e procedimentos da área de Governança, Produtos de limpeza e sua utilização e Pacote Office

results.title: Engenheiro de Dados - C/C++
results.description:
Nossa Oportunidade

.
Estamos à procura de um Engenheiro de Dados (C++) . Se você é talentoso(a) e apaixonado(a) por tecnologia que procura uma função híbrida dinâmica, então somos o lugar para você.

.

  • Nossa oportunidade é híbrida, jornada de trabalho flexível (40 horas semanais) e o modelo de contratação é CLT.

O Perfil que buscamos:

C/C+
Knowledge in Linux 
Basic knowledge of docker 
Intermediate English - for wrtitting and communication
Ability to learn quickly 
Experience working in Agile environment 

Would be a plus, if you have:
Good knowledge of Bazel 
Experience as a build engineer or similar role 
Knowledge of Python 

 


Get the future you want

.

Por meio de uma força de trabalho diversificada que representa nossa sociedade promovemos uma cultura inclusiva, construindo um lugar onde nossos talentos são acompanhados por líderes transformacionais e equipes altamente engajadas. Através do SejaVocê@Capgemini expressamos o nosso compromisso em compreender continuamente as características e interesses que tornam cada uma das nossas pessoas únicas. Nos orgulhamos da nossa diversidade e estamos empenhados em promover um ambiente inclusivo e com equidade de oportunidades. Nossas vagas, são para todas as pessoas independente de cor, etnia, religião, idade, identidade de gênero, orientação sexual ou deficiência.

.

Somos reconhecidos pela GPTW como um ótimo lugar para trabalhar e uma das 10 melhores empresas para mulheres trabalharem no Brasil. Nosso compromisso com Equidade de Gênero também foi reconhecido pela Bloomberg pelo segundo ano consecutivo e somos certificados pela Edge e Edge Plus também focada em equidade de gênero. Além de estarmos no 11º ano consecutivo pelo Instituto Ethispere como uma das Empresas Mais Éticas do Mundo.

.

Aqui você pode ser quem você é: Protagonista do seu desenvolvimento com oportunidades de aprendizagem, crescimento e atuação em projetos desafiadores. 

 .

Além disso temos a preocupação em oferecer pacote de remuneração e benefícios competitivos no segmento, reconhecendo as competências, performance individual e de equipe. Voltados para o seu Bem Estar Físico, Emocional, Financeiro e Familiar. 

 .

  • Pacote de Benefícios: Assistência Médica, Telemedicina Einstein Conecta, Plano Odontológico, Convênio Farmácia, Acesso a plataformas de saúde física e mental (Gympass e Equilibrium), Vale Refeição, Seguro de Vida, Previdência Privada, Auxílio Home Office, Empréstimo consignado, Plano de Participação Acionária, Clube de benefícios e muito mais! 

 .

  • Plano de carreira que  incentiva sua jornada e  desenvolvimento,  proporcionando visibilidade  de forma clara sobre as  oportunidades de carreira e  os requisitos necessários  para o seu próximo nível. 

 .

  • Universidade Corporativa e Learning Hub : Aqui você constrói a sua própria trilha de desenvolvimento com uma formação dinâmica e acelerada. Terá acesso gratuitamente a cursos disponíveis parceiros de alto nível para aprimorar suas habilidades técnicas e comportamentais. Além de contar com plataformas de ensino reconhecidas como Harvard Manage Mentor, Coursera, Udemy e Pluralsight. 

 .

  • Acesso a certificações oficiais com nossos parceiros como: AI Breakthrough award, AWS, Avasant, CDP “A” list, Ecovadis, Everest, Ethisphere, Gartner, IDC Google, Microsoft, SAP, Salesforce, ServiceNow e muito mais. 

 .

  • Através da EF Education First (English Live Brasil): Você terá acesso a plataforma on line, com aulas adaptadas ao seu nível para se desenvolver nos idiomas: Inglês, Espanhol, Francês e Alemão . 

.

Sobre a Capgemini

.

A Capgemini é líder global em parceria com empresas para transformar e gerenciar negócios, aproveitando o poder da tecnologia, desde estratégia e design até operações, alimentadas pelo mundo inovador e em rápida evolução da nuvem, dados, IA, conectividade, software, engenharia digital e plataformas

.

Contamos com mais de 360.000 profissionais presentes em mais de 50 países, em 2022 o Grupo reportou receitas globais de € 22 bilhões.

.

Somos guiados diariamente pelo propósito de liberar a energia humana por meio da tecnologia para um futuro inclusivo e sustentável e por nossos sete valores: Honestidade, Audácia, Confiança, Liberdade, Espírito de equipe, Modéstia e Fun. Se você compartilha dos mesmos valores, aqui é o seu lugar!

results.title: PREPARADOR MAQUINAS I
results.description:
Responsabilidades & Atribuições

  • Realizar liberação de Máquinas, seguindo o plano de controle e interpretação dos relatórios dimensionais;
  • Realizar troca de ferramentas nas maquinas produtivas conforme vida útil e necessidades técnicas;
  • Realizar Setup conforme instrução;
  • Realizar tomada de tempo de ciclo de máquina para o monitoramento da equipe;
  • Realizar substituição de dispositivos de fixação em caso de quebras.

 

Habilidades & Pontos Fortes

  • Ensino Tecnico Completo ou cursando nas areas de Mecanica, Mecatronica, Eletroeletronica e areas correlatas;
  • Conhecimento em programação CNC (torno CNC/Centro de Usinagem);
  • Desejável conhecimento em ferramentas de corte;
  • Noções basicas de informática;
  • Desejável noções básicas de desenho técnico e instrumentos de medição. 

 

 

   Você tem alguma dúvida?
   
   fernanda.garavelli.ramos@mahle.com  
   

Por favor, utilize o endereço de e-mail apenas se você tiver alguma dúvida. Para se inscrever, use o botão “inscrever-se” e preencha o formulário de inscrição. Qualquer currículo enviado por e-mail não será processado.

results.title: Pessoa Supervisora de Relacionamento com o Cliente
results.description:
📚  Feita de pessoas que transformam a educação 

Todas as vagas da Arco são elegíveis para Pessoas com Deficiência. 

 

Quais serão os seus desafios    - Gerenciamento da equipe de atendimento;   - Desenvolvimento do time;   - Avaliação de desempenho;   - Resolução de problemas e escalonamentos;   - Monitoramento de métricas de desempenho;   - Monitoramento da qualidade do atendimento;   - Gestão de incidentes e reclamações.   Buscamos talentos que tenham:     - Ensino superior completo;

- Experiência anterior em cargos de liderança;

- Conhecimento com as melhores práticas de atendimento ao cliente;

 - Familiaridade com sistemas de gerenciamento de relacionamento com o cliente (CRM);

- Orientação para resultados e capacidade para trabalhar com metas e prazos;

- Flexibilidade e adaptabilidade para lidar com mudanças e demandas em constante evolução.

O que você vai encontrar na Arco, além de pessoas incríveis:  

🍽️ Auxílio alimentação e/ou refeição  🏥 Plano de saúde e odontológico  🚌 Vale transporte  🤰🏽 Licença maternidade e paternidade estendida  🚸 Auxílio creche para mães  🏋🏻‍♀️ Cuidado com a saúde física: parceria com a Gympass  📚 Incentivo à educação ✈️ Desconto em passagens aéreas    #MaisDiversidade   Acreditamos que em um ambiente diverso e inclusivo nossas pessoas serão mais felizes, engajadas e com mais chances de atingir o seu máximo potencial. Por isso, aqui na Arco, respeitamos e valorizamos a igualdade de direito, reconhecemos as singularidades e acreditamos que todas as pessoas podem contribuir para o nosso propósito. #VemPraArco

results.title: Digital Marketing Account Manager
results.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - Remote
results.description:
We are:

Wisevu (pronounced Wiseview) is a well-established and highly experienced remote digital marketing agency, founded in 2008, with headquarters in Toronto, Ontario, Canada, and Split Croatia.

We are a team of highly skilled and passionate remote web developers, web designers, SEO engineers and digital marketing experts helping essential businesses through industry-leading digital marketing solutions.

We are looking for:

We're looking for a passionate and talented Accounts Manager to join our growing digital marketing agency. You'll be responsible for building and managing strong relationships with assigned clients, ensuring their success through effective communication and proactive account management.

Requirements

Responsibilities:

  • Client Relationship Management: Build and nurture strong, long-term relationships with assigned clients. Be the primary point of contact, understanding their business goals and challenges.

  • Strategic Planning: Collaborate with the client and internal teams to onboard new clients and develop data-driven digital marketing strategies aligned with client objectives.

  • Project Management: Oversee assigned client projects from kickoff to completion, ensuring tasks are delivered on time, within budget, and to Wisevu's high standards.

  • Campaign Management: Work closely with the internal team to manage and optimize ongoing digital marketing campaigns (SEO, PPC, website builds, content etc.)

  • Reporting & Analysis: Regularly communicate campaign performance to clients through insightful reports and presentations, identifying trends and optimizing strategies.

  • Upselling & New Client Acquisition: Upselling existing clients, as well as being involved in acquiring new clients. 

  • Staying Ahead of the Curve: Keep up-to-date with the latest digital marketing trends and technologies to recommend the most effective solutions for clients.

Qualifications:

  • 2-5 years of experience in digital marketing or a related field.
  • Proven track record of building and managing successful client relationships.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to clearly explain complex marketing concepts to clients.
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Experience with project management methodologies (e.g., Agile) a plus.
  • Proficiency in project management tools and digital marketing platforms.
  • Strong understanding of digital marketing. 
  • Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
  • Highly organized and detail-oriented with excellent time management skills.

Highly Desired:

  • 3+ years of experience in a client service role, ideally within a marketing or advertising agency.
  • A solid understanding of digital marketing including SEO, PPC, social media marketing, content marketing, UI/UX and email marketing.
  • A track record of exceeding client goals and growing their business through your account management efforts.

Work-timings:

  • Able to provide at least 5 hours of overlap with the 9 am-5 pm EST workday (Monday - Friday).
  • Weekends are also optional for additional income.

Benefits

  • Compensation: Competitive starting salary between $2000-$3500 CAD which will be negotiated during the interview based on competencies, skills and experience.
  • Working remotely: Work from the comfort of your own home office or workspace
  • Flexible working schedule
  • Employee Development Courses: Fun & highly educational career opportunity. Paid premium-quality Employee Development Courses. As well as one-on-one training from highly experienced digital marketers with over 15 years of experience.
  • Quality Equipment: Free Computer & Cell Phone.
  • Quarterly performance bonuses.
  • Many other benefits will be discussed during the interview.

If you're a client-focused marketer with a passion for building strong relationships, we'd love to hear from you!  At Wisevu, you'll have the opportunity to play a key role in our clients' success as well as advance to more executive positions. We look forward to meeting you and potentially working together for many great years to come!

Please Apply Here: https://apply.workable.com/wisevu/j/356E85C7DD/apply/

Note: We currently have multiple openings available.

Open to remote applicants from Brazil.

Wisevu Inc.

results.title: Chemical Engineer
results.description:
Chemical Engineer

Sibelco is a global material solutions company. We mine, process and sell industrial minerals at locations worldwide, focused primarily on silica, clays, feldspathics and olivine.  We are also leaders in glass recycling. The Sibelco Group operates over 110 production sites in 31 countries, with a team of over 5,000 people.

Click to see how Sibelco materials are used in products within and outside your home.

Location:

SP Red Hill

As a Chemical Engineer you will provide engineering expertise and chemical process knowledge to improve existing processes for high-quality production outcomes. Analyse and assist existing processes to improve quality and enhance the technical performance of our quartz products.

Responsibilities

  • Aid Process Engineering projects from idea to operational ramp-up by providing context from a commercial/customer perspective

  • Provide input and suggestions to execute experiments and testing for process changes and customer evaluation material

  • Conduct technical, operational, and/or project ad-hoc audits on a specific need basis, under the Sibelco Process Audit Guidelines

  • Evaluate the minerals and materials processes and identify unnecessary complexities or flaws

  • Support installation of control systems, sketching the more suitable philosophy control.

  • Support Sibelco production sites and project teams to promote operational excellence, provide technical best practices, and ensure safe (HAS-compliant), efficient, effective innovative, scalable, and sustainable operations

  • Advise other departments on how to maximize the efficiency of existing installations by suggesting improvements and bottlenecking

  • Develop a detailed understanding of our customers’ processes to assist in problem-solving and continuous improvement for both Sibelco and our customers.

Qualifications

  • Bachelor’s degree and/or Master’s degree in Chemical Engineering

  • 2 – 5 years experience in an industrial environment

  • English – advanced verbal and written

Benefits

  • Medical Insurance

  • Prescription Drug Benefits

  • Dental Insurance

  • Vision Insurance

  • Life Insurance

  • Disability Insurance

  • Critical Illness Insurance

  • 401(k) Retirement Savings Plan

But most importantly, if you embrace our core values, and if this role sparks your enthusiasm to apply your passion to contribute in a meaningful way as a part of Sibelco’s team of unique talents within a diverse international business community, then we very much look forward to hearing from you. 

 

To Apply:

Please click apply to register your information and contact details on the recruitment portal so one of our team can get in touch. 

 

Inclusive Team Culture: Attractive Employer (sibelco.com)

Sibelco recognises the strength of our diverse global workforce and values difference and inclusion for all. Our rich mix of people bring an exciting exchange of ideas and knowledge to keep us moving forward and innovating new solutions. We seek talent of all backgrounds and abilities and continue to develop our leaders and our culture to help all current and new employees to grow and reach their full potential.

 

Salary & Benefits: We will gladly discuss these aspects with you at interview stage.

 

Meet our People: Careers (sibelco.com)

Recruitment Process: Recruitment process (sibelco.com)

We welcome your application and will make reasonable adjustments where required to support you through the selection process.

Sibelco Targets: Sibelco priorities (sibelco.com) 

We have set clearly defined sustainability priorities and targets, with key environmental and social objectives, which include Health & Safety, Climate & Energy, Community Engagement, Human Rights and Business Ethics.

Please note we have a Global Talent Acquisition Team and we will not therefore be requiring agency services

results.title: Manager, Business Development
results.description:
Our Purpose

We work to connect and power an inclusive, digital economy that benefits everyone, everywhere by making transactions safe, simple, smart and accessible. Using secure data and networks, partnerships and passion, our innovations and solutions help individuals, financial institutions, governments and businesses realize their greatest potential. Our decency quotient, or DQ, drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company. We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths, views, and experiences. We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team – one that makes better decisions, drives innovation and delivers better business results.

Title and Summary

Manager, Business Development

This position will support Acquirer Account officers to Manage their accounts AND the Merchant Relationship Manager to implement the Merchant Strategy. The supporting role is help to implement acquirer and acceptance related programs, initiatives to increase card acceptance in established and emerging industries; will also support the Merchant strategy implementation for Brazil, taking into consideration the approved market strategic direction imperative to strengthen relationships with merchants by creating preference in key merchants for MCW and its customers through the respective MC acquirer.
Other related functions are:
Support execution of business plans which promote the value and profitability of MasterCard acceptance.
Perform analysis, competitive intelligence and identify broad business initiatives that provide an appreciable return on financial investments.
Build strong business cases including financial analysis to generate positive impacts in card-holders attrition reduction, incremental card activation rates and new revenue streams for MasterCard through merchant/acquirer programs.
Jointly, the activities above will strength MCW relationship with key stakeholders, promote the brand, generate POI preference and ultimately, spending, activation and MCW revenues; The position owner, he or she, will help implement the selected approach to identify merchant’s needs and work, directly and indirectly to bring value to those customers using MCW assets, integrating them into business building activities across all functional areas as appropriate.
Will have a direct relationship with:
• Acquirer’s Account Officers: that will manage, through large acquirers, an additional merchant portfolio (usually, key accounts with strategic relationship with Redecard, Cielo, Santander, Citi and Banrisul; minimum of 5 , up to 8-10 large accounts each, meaning a total between 30 – 40 key merchants;
• Merchant Marketing: which will provide fulfillment to Merchant Strategy, guided by Merchant Relations. On top of supporting the Acquirer Account officer, the position owner will have direct responsibility for circa of 5-10 key accounts through the relationship with the Acquirer managed by his / her supervisor.
Job Purpose:
Integral member of the Acceptance South Cone – LAC team with responsibility for help developing relationships and help to drive revenues in Brazil through Acquirers and their key accounts (merchants).
Major Accountabilities
• Support account management responsibilities – support Acquirers BDDs and manage assigned merchant accounts:
1. Deal formalization and approval
a. Prepare business model set up to review w/ Supervisor and Finance
b. Manage B-smart process (input and approval process)
c. Legal review coordination
2. CAR input and approval process
3. B2B Assets Campaigns:
a. Secure internal approval (negotiation with internal asset owners, BC preparation and submission)
b. Control and report performance (secure periodic reporting from clients)
c. Secure client sign up into MC’s formal agreements (assets usage contract, Income Tax commitment, asset usage confirmation letter)
4. Help to coordinate invitations / events attendance (includes weekends)
a. MC events:
i. F1 / UEFA / Copa America
ii. End of Year meetings
iii. Sales Conventions
b. Client events:
i. Sales Conventions
ii. Annual Report input
iii. Charity Events
iv. Cultural Events
v. Client relationship events
c. Industry events
i. Alshop
ii. C4
iii. Atualuxo
5. Branded Souvenir / gifts inventory management
• Support strategy implementation that grow MasterCard revenue and share as well as support our customer's business objectives as defined by Acceptance & Merchant Relationship Team’s Management
• Support relationships at middle management level inside acquirer that will lead to the expansion of MasterCard’s business through merchant relationships
• Support daily management responsibility for the acceptance business in acquirer’s key merchants
• Support promotional programs with acquirers in order to assure or increase MC share in key merchants;
• Support generation of promotional leads to fulfill the “Promotional Platform” shelves with offers and differentials (to be communicated by customer marketing to consumers – cardholders);
Skills Required:
• Bi-lingual Portuguese and English, both written and spoken
• Spanish would be a plus;
• Excellent analytical skills (e.g., cards P&L analysis, financial forecasting, competitive analysis)
• Superior presentation skills, written and oral (including in English);
• Proven ability to develop business relationships at all levels
• Results-oriented and customer-focused
• Strong Sales / Business Development / Relationship Management background, preferably gained in Retail Industry ( Retailer or Consumer Products );
• Experience in issuing or acquiring can be a “plus”;
• Strong / deep knowledge of the retail environment with the preferred sectors being High street retail, Supermarkets, Soft retail, Department Store, Oil and the T&E sector;
• Ability to understand and execute on key operational aspects, and attentive to details;
• Excellent problem solving, analytic capabilities and business acumen;
• Selling Skills with ability to initiate, pursue and close a sale, as well as strong influencing and negotiation skills;
• Minimum Bachelor's Degree, MBA is a “plus”;
• Proven track record of project management capabilities;
• Team-player with hands-on attitude, strong collaborations skills;
• Strong Market knowledge is required (due to market peculiarities) ; should be a professional “ready to get on board”;
Experience Required:
• At least 5 years of relevant experience in sales and business development at market leaders in business that provides services or goods to retailers;
• Or similar / equivalent relevant experience with market leaders in the payments industry serving retailers;
• Sales and account management experience is preferred, as is local market experience.
Competencies:
• Candidate should be able to demonstrate a level of business acumen and thought leadership that delivers customer focused, solution oriented results
• Strong leadership skills, capable of leading a team and working in a matrix environment
• Customer Focused. Dedicated to meeting the expectations and requirements of internal and external customers
• Strong Project Management Skills
• Must be able to sell to Senior Management
Education:
• College degree required;
• MBA is a plus;
• Advanced business degree preferred
Other:
• National traveling required;
• Eventually international;

Corporate Security Responsibility


All activities involving access to Mastercard assets, information, and networks comes with an inherent risk to the organization and, therefore, it is expected that every person working for, or on behalf of, Mastercard is responsible for information security and must:

  • Abide by Mastercard’s security policies and practices;

  • Ensure the confidentiality and integrity of the information being accessed;

  • Report any suspected information security violation or breach, and

  • Complete all periodic mandatory security trainings in accordance with Mastercard’s guidelines.

results.title: Head of Product Launch and Growth - BR
results.location: BRA - Sao Paulo - Corp - Avenida Paulista P
results.description:
The Company

PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy. 

We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.

We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards.  Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade. 

Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day.  We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.

Job Description Summary:

This person will be responsible for understanding product and market needs, identifying right set of partner(s), lead commercial negotiations and defining a strong go-to-market. In addition this person also liaises with the partner ecosystem, including the strategy and relationships with payment networks, acquirers, processors and financial institutions.

Job Description:

Your way to Impact:

This role requires an outcome-focused, self-driven individual who can navigate and influence in a hyper-matrixed organization and has the gravitas to manage C-level stakeholders across a broad spectrum of external partners. Success in this role will require both technical and commercial acumen, strong multitasking and prioritization ability, and a knack for seamlessly shifting between detail-oriented, technical tasks and strategic thought leadership.

  • The incumbent will be responsible for leading partnerships and developing frameworks for solving for existing or new product capabilities.
  • Posses strategic ability to translate impact to our customers, E2E user experience, messaging, GTM strategy to any PayPal customer segments into targeted messaging and content to launch / deprecate new products impacting relevant markets.
  • Have an entrepreneurial mindset - continually mining opportunities and leading initiatives end-to-end with minimal supervision. 
  • Familiarity with PayPal’s business models, functional domains and core processes is a strong plus

In your day-to-day role you will:

  • Lead complex strategic partnership negotiations and implementations with financial institutions.
  • Support partnerships from idea to contract to execution to ongoing growth
  • Identify new business opportunities for PayPal and partners
  • Inform product roadmap and marketing strategy based on partnership priorities
  • Lead & build a customer centric and commercially viable Go-to-Market strategies
  • Track performance & make GTM / Partnership/ Product changes whenever necessary
  • Collaborate with cross-functional and cross-regional teams, liaise and communicate with Senior Management

What do you need to bring:

  • 5+ years of professional experience across strategy consulting, partnerships, go-to-market
  • Ability to craft stories and messaging development for products and partnership
  • Experience in managing external partners both at a function and executive level ; strong relationship-management and commercial negotiation skills
  • Track record of working independently and effectively in a cross-functional, hyper-matrixed environment
  • Highly entrepreneurial, self-driven and independent
  • Has a curious mindset and a natural inclination for creative problem solving
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to influence across functions and levels
  • Analytical and methodical – able to manage multiple, high-priority work streams with the agility, and the ability to continually reprioritize in line with dynamic business strategies

Additional Job Description:

Subsidiary:

PayPal

Travel Percent:

0

For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.

Our Benefits:

At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.

We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com.

Who We Are:

Click Here to learn more about our culture and community.

Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion 

PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law.  In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities.  If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at talentaccommodations@paypal.com.  

Belonging at PayPal: 

Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.

Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.

We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.

Orbia Advance Corporation es una compañía guiada por un propósito y grandes aspiraciones. Nuestra razón de ser es impulsar la vida alrededor del mundo, maximizando el valor para nuestros socios, clientes y empleados. Nuestra pasión como compañía gira alrededor de temas que definen cómo la gente vivirá y prosperará mañana: el futuro de las ciudades, edificios, agricultura y materiales. Orbia Advance Corporation cuenta con cinco grupos de negocio que ofrecen soluciones innovadoras a lo largo de múltiples industrias incluyendo la construcción e infraestructura, transmisión de datos, químicos y más. En el 2018 Orbia Advance Corporation adquirió la mayor parte de las acciones de Netafim, ubicado en Israel, el mayor líder en el mundo de riego por goteo, quien está ayudando al mundo a crecer más con menos ya que ayuda a resolver la escasez de comida y agua. results.title: Vendedor - Shopping Morumbi, SP
results.description:
Na Swarovski, onde a inovação se encontra com a inspiração, os nossos Sales Consultants são os nossos derradeiros defensores, que prestam aos clientes um serviço extraordinário e uma experiência de marca inspiradora.

Estamos à procura de um(a) Sales Consultant com curiosidade e carisma que implante o cristal nos corações e mãos dos nossos clientes, que se junte a uma equipa com paixão e entusiasmo, e que torne os sonhos dos nossos clientes uma realidade.

Junte-se a nós se estiver na busca de um cargo compensador no seio de uma equipa multidisciplinar que consegue expandir horizontes e partilha a sua paixão genuína por moda e bijuteria.

Faça parte de uma marca global verdadeiramente icónica, aprenda e cresça connosco. Um mundo maravilhoso espera por si.

Sobre o cargo

Você é defensor(a) da nossa marca. Nesta função, e juntamente com a equipa, irá:

  • acompanhar os nossos clientes durante a sua fascinante viagem pelo mundo maravilhoso da Swarovski; 
  • criar uma ligação emocional com os nossos clientes e proporcionar-lhes uma experiência mágica;
  • antecipar as necessidades dos nossos clientes e partilhar com eles dicas de estilismo inspiradoras;
  • expor e apresentar os nossos produtos lendários.

Sobre si

Você é um(a) Sales Consultant excecional, que nos oferece:

  • um excelente sentido de moda e uma verdadeira paixão pela nossa marca e os nossos produtos;
  • experiência/forte interesse nas marcas de moda/cosmética/estilo de vida de luxo;
  • uma personalidade fortemente motivada e focada na orientação do cliente; 
  • dedicação e atitude orientada por objetivos;
  • vontade de desenvolver a sua carreira e crescer connosco;
  • experiência anterior em revenda.

O que oferecemos

Você pode esperar uma série de benefícios, incluindo:

  • Descontos em produtos Swarovski
  • Programa de Assistência ao Funcionário
  • Licença para trabalho voluntário
  • Programas de aprendizagem e desenvolvimento

Mestres da luz desde 1895

A Swarovski produz produtos à base de cristal de qualidade e habilidade artística impecáveis que trazem alegria e celebram a individualidade.

Fundada em 1895 na Áustria, a empresa desenha, fabrica e vende sofisticados cristais, pedras preciosas, diamantes e zircônias fabricadas e acessórios, bem como objetos de cristal e acessórios para a casa. A Swarovski Crystal Business tem alcance global com aproximadamente 2.400 lojas e 6.700 pontos de vendas em cerca de 140 países e emprega mais de 18.000 pessoas. Junto com suas empresas irmãs, a Swarovski Optik (dispositivos ópticos) e a Tyrolit (abrasivos), a Swarovski Crystal Business compõe o Swarovski Group. Uma relação saudável com as pessoas e com o planeta é parte da herança da Swarovski. Hoje, esse legado se fundamenta em medidas de sustentabilidade em toda a cadeia de valor, com ênfase na inovação circular, defendendo a diversidade, inclusão e autoexpressão, e no trabalho filantrópico da Swarovski Foundation, que apoia organizações de caridade que provocam um impacto ambiental e social positivo.

Swarovski é um empregador de igualdade de oportunidades. Oferemos à nossa equipe a coragem de celebrar a individualidade e o orgulho de criar um local de trabalho onde as pessoas se sintam envolvidas, respeitadas, valorizadas, conectadas e ouvidas. Um lugar onde qualquer pessoa se sinta parte da empresa. Todos os aspectos do emprego, incluindo a decisão de contratar, promover, disciplinar ou demitir, serão baseados no mérito, competência, desempenho e necessidades do negócio. Não discriminamos com base em raça, cor, religião, estado civil, idade, nacionalidade, deficiência física ou mental, condição médica, gravidez, gênero, orientação sexual, identidade ou expressão de gênero ou qualquer outro status protegido por lei nos países onde operamos.

results.title: Consultor(a) Técnico Comercial -Confresa - MT
results.description:
Cargo: Consultor(a) Técnico Comercial 
Localização: Confresa - MT
Tipo de trabalho - Presencial
Nível da vaga: C39

 

Este profissional será responsável por prover conhecimento no segmento específico (leite, confinamento e pastagem) sobre nutrição e gestão para apoiar as vendas da tecnologia dsm-firmenich, além de atender a força de vendas e os principais clientes. 

 

Na dsm-firmenich as pessoas estão no coração da empresa. Estamos comprometidos com a igualdade de oportunidades de emprego e valorizamos a diversidade no local de trabalho.

 

Suas Principais Responsabilidades: 

 

  • Fornecer assistência técnica aos principais clientes, criando boas práticas de gestão em visitas agendadas de acordo com as necessidades e o orçamento, e seguindo as regras do programa PITT.
  • Formular dietas e misturas para os clientes utilizando o software designado pela DSM para esse serviço.
  • Introduzir produtos e conceitos da DSM nas fazendas atendidas, utilizando isso como uma ferramenta para melhorar os resultados, gerando benefícios financeiros para o cliente.
  • Oferecer suporte técnico à equipe de vendas sobre as tecnologias e produtos da DSM, novas tendências na produção de gado e perspectivas de mercado.Coletar e organizar dados dos clientes para programas de benchmarking.
  • Ministrar palestras sobre as tecnologias DSM e práticas de manejo de gado em faculdades, universidades, dias de campo e eventos organizados pela equipe.
  • Gerenciar as fazendas atendidas em relação ao orçamento e aos produtos tecnológicos utilizados.Organizar relatórios após cada visita à fazenda, mantendo-os como documentação.

 

O que oferecemos:

 

  • Uma história rica e um futuro promissor de inovação científica ousada e criação apaixonada com nossos clientes;
  • Um espaço para crescer encorajando e apoiando a curiosidade e uma mentalidade aberta;
  • Uma cultura que prioriza a segurança e o bem-estar, tanto física quanto mentalmente;
  • A oportunidade de trabalhar para uma empresa onde a sustentabilidade é muito mais do que uma reivindicação e é essencial para nossa estratégia e propósito;
  • Um ambiente de trabalho flexível que capacita as pessoas a assumir a responsabilidade por seu trabalho e a possuir o resultado;
  • Uma ânsia de ser uma equipe e aprender uns com os outros para trazer progresso à vida e criar um futuro melhor.

 

O que buscamos: 

 

  • Formação técnica em Veterinária, Zootecnica ou Agronomia, Mestrado, Pós graduação será considerado diferencial.  
  • Desejavel conhecimento técnico de formulações de dietas e  manejo de pastagens. 
  • Bom relacionamento interpessoal e saber trabalhar em equipe, perfil com posicionamento comercial é um diferencial
  • Disponibilidade para viagens. 

 

Compromisso com a igualdade de oportunidades
A dsm-firmenich é totalmente dedicada à inclusão, porque quando as pessoas se sentem engajadas e empoderadas, sua criatividade e inovação impulsionam um progresso sem precedentes. Nosso objetivo é construir um local de trabalho onde as oportunidades sejam realmente iguais, para que todos possam prosperar. Não discriminamos: há um lugar para todos na dsm-firmenich.
A dsm-firmenich é um empregador de oportunidades iguais e ações afirmativas. O pessoal da dsm-firmenich é tão diverso quanto nossos clientes. Para nós, isso inclui o compromisso de garantir oportunidades iguais de emprego para todos os candidatos e funcionários. As decisões de emprego são baseadas em motivos relacionados ao trabalho, independentemente da raça, cor, religião, sexo, orientação sexual, identidade de gênero, idade, nacionalidade, deficiência, estado civil, informações genéticas, status de veterano protegido ou qualquer outro status protegido por lei.
Estamos empenhados em fornecer suporte razoável para pessoas com deficiência em nosso processo de recrutamento. Se você precisar de ajuda e se sentir à vontade para compartilhar isso, informe-nos.

 

Sobre a dsm-firmenich
Como inovadores em nutrição, saúde e beleza, a dsm-firmenich reinventa, fabrica e combina nutrientes, sabores e fragrâncias vitais para o crescimento da população mundial. Com nossa ampla gama de soluções, com ingredientes naturais e renováveis e reconhecida capacidade científica e tecnológica, trabalhamos para criar o que é essencial para a vida, desejável para os consumidores e mais sustentável para o planeta. A dsm-firmenich é uma empresa suíça-holandesa, listada na Euronext Amsterdam, com operações em quase 60 países e receitas de mais de € 12 bilhões. Com uma equipe diversificada e mundial de quase 30.000 funcionários, damos vida ao progresso™ todos os dias, em todos os lugares, para bilhões de pessoas.

Hemos emprendido una transformación dirigida por nuestro CEO; como parte de nuestro viaje hacia convertirnos en una compañía dirigida por un propósito y preparada para el futuro.
